_description: On obedience — five monorhyming lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notes following ‘Oculos parat visui…’ attributed in the MS to Jerome

NLS18721.Transcription:
Eyne to seingEres to heringTunge to spekingHondis to
                    werchngffeet to going
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 29-30.
